title: New: Tora – Calming Her
content:
Australia’s Tora only released their debut ‘Demo’s EP a matter of weeks ago, and are already back on the horse with new track Calming Her.

As with their previous four tracks, it’s minimal, deeply emotive electronica, in the vein of James Blake or SOHN, built upon a foundation of sampled vocals and looped synths. Check out Calming Her below, and keep up with Tora on Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
